response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its high value and unique features, I understand its worth to you stands at $10,000. Considering the exceptional quality and benefits it offers, I propose a price of $9,500 for this remarkable product. This offer allows you to acquire an asset valued at $10,000 for a competitive price, maximizing your return on investment. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how this product can contribute to your success. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 9500}
